numerator.name: sterile_sector
numerator.explanation: The sterile sector emerges from the 7-fold octonionic structure of the G2 manifold (7 = dim(G2)) scaled by the Pleroma (b3=24), minus the 5-fold pentagrammic defect (5 = dimension of compactified space).

denominator.name: decad_projection
denominator.explanation: The Decad (10) is a fundamental PM constant representing the 'residual pressure key' (163 - 153 = 10). The projection b3*10 = 240 is the natural Decad scaling of the Pleroma, minus 1 for the observer collapse (unity extraction).

verdict.upgrade_recommendation: CONSIDER UPGRADE: Derivation shows <1% error. May need additional correction term or refinement of the geometric interpretation.
